bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names tu xie 吐瀉 , vomiting and outflow; tu xie 吐泄 , vomiting and outflow.

① Alternative Names tu xia 吐下 , vomiting and discharge. Illness Sign of xie xie 泄瀉 , outflow, accompanied by ou tu 嘔吐 , vomiting. Shang han lun 傷寒論 383: 病發熱、頭痛、身疼、惡 寒、吐利者，此屬何病? “If someone suffers from an effusion of heat, headaches, pain in the entire body, an aversion to cold, with vomiting and free flow , with what disease are these [illness signs] associated?”

② Alternative Names ou xie 嘔泄 , vomiting and outflow. Pathological Condition with vomiting and outflow. SW 70 ：其氣逆，其病吐利 , “Its qi moves contrary [to its regular course]. Its illnesses are vomiting and free flow ”. ③ Pharmacological Effect causing vomiting and outflow. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Lj: 食諸菌中毒，悶亂欲死…服諸 吐利藥，並解 , “If one were poisoned by eating mushrooms, with heart-pressure and chaotic [qi] as if one were about to die…ingest any medication causing vomiting and free flow , and all this will be resolved”.
